ask:
ask <question> - returns yes or no
ask <option1> or <option2> or ... or <optionN> - returns a random option
coinflip: coinflip - returns heads or tails at random
grabr:
grabr - returns random grab
grabr <person> - returns random grab said by <person>
grab: grab - adds the last message sent to the grabs list
list: list - PM's the list of places
wtell: wtell <person> <message> - adds <message> to <person>'s work tells - see the home command
dlq: dlq - adds a given item to the download queue
roll:
roll <number>d<faces> - rolls <number> of <faces>-sided dice
roll <number>d<faces>+<mod> - gives the sum of a dice roll with the given modifier added
roll <number>d<faces>x<rolls> - rolls <number> of <faces>-sided dice <rolls> times
remind:
remind <string> - adds <string> to list of things to remind
remind - displays things to remind
commands: commands - PM's the user a list of commands
